name: BearAI
description: What is the project about? PROJECT DESCRIPTION: Bear AI is an innovative crypto project designed to empower users with the wisdom and insights needed to navigate the crypto market, even during the most challenging bear markets. Our AI allows users to ask educational crypto questions and receive knowledgeable responses, making crypto education accessible and dynamic.
